title: snowflake.core.view.ViewResource | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Represents a reference to a Snowflake view.
With this view reference, you can drop and fetch information about views.

if_exists (bool, optional) – Check the existence of this view before dropping it.
Default is None, which is equivalent to False.
Deleting a view using its reference:

Fetch the details of a view.
